Detailed Description

Interface to communicate traffic elements to a database.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum TrafficElementDatabase::UpdateStatus
 

Bitmask for updateChangeset.

Enumeration values:
OK  The entire changeset was successful.
UPDATE_FAILED  Update or add elements failed.
REMOVE_FAILED  Remove elements failed.

Update changes in database by adding new and/or removing old.
